source.cb34e472:
def showing_img(index):
    print (df_ETT_ab.iloc[index].StudyInstanceUID)
    data=df_ETT_ab.iloc[index]['data']
    coors=json.loads(data)
    images=cv2.imread(os.path.join(image_folder, df_ETT_ab.iloc[index]['StudyInstanceUID']+'.jpg'),0)
    images=cv2.cvtColor(clahe.apply(images),cv2.COLOR_GRAY2RGB)

    images_ori=images.copy()
    h,w=images.shape[0:2]
    blue = (0, 0, 255)
    for n, j in enumerate(coors):
        if n != len(coors)-1:
            print (coors[n])
            cv2.line(images, tuple(coors[n]), tuple(coors[n+1]), blue, 3)
    
    plt.subplot(121)
    plt.imshow(images_ori)
    plt.subplot(122)
    plt.imshow(images)

source.4a5e5bcc:
There are only 29 ETT-abnormal cases. (Total is 30 but one case is not abnormal ETT case).

It is small datasets to learn abnormal ETT position.

So I think that models have to find relationship between the tip or all of the endotracheal tube and tracheal bifurcation.
source.89452957: the tip of endotracheal tube enters into right main bronchus
